description: 7-day themed rotation with multiple research batches per night. Observed runtime ~30-40 min per run. Limits set aggressively — pipeline has massive headroom in a 12-hour window.

themes.name: earnings
themes.notes: Scan earnings calendar for unscanned Q results. Priority: critical > high > monitor.

themes.name: press-keyword
themes.notes: Structural keyword searches: CAIO, AI lab, restructuring, center of excellence.

themes.name: tier1-tier2-podcasts
themes.notes: Check all Tier 1 (6) + Tier 2 (8) podcast feeds. Deep-scan new high-priority episodes.

themes.name: tier25-podcasts
themes.notes: Check Tier 2.5 AI Leadership podcasts (8 shows).

themes.name: daily-news-scan
themes.notes: Headline scan of AI Daily Brief, The AI Breakdown, Last Week in AI for structural signals.

themes.name: substacks-all-tiers
themes.notes: Scan all Tier 1 (6), Tier 2 (7), Tier 2.5 (3) substacks for new structural content.

themes.name: enterprise-reports
themes.notes: Check BCG AI Radar, OpenAI State of Enterprise AI, Deloitte Tech Trends, PwC AI Predictions, HBR AI Strategy, Mercer, Oxford Economics, i4cp, State of AI Report.

themes.name: target-specimens-phase-a
themes.notes: Work through target-specimens.json Phase A (new specimens). Priority by quadrant coverage gaps.

themes.name: stale-refresh
themes.notes: Find specimens with oldest lastUpdated dates. Enrich with fresh data. At 24/week, cycles through all 157 active specimens in ~7 Thursdays (~2 months).

themes.name: target-specimens-phase-b
themes.notes: Enrich existing specimens from target-specimens.json Phase B.

themes.name: press-keyword
themes.notes: Second weekly press sweep — different keyword set from Monday.

themes.name: earnings-followup
themes.notes: Follow up on any earnings reported this week that weren't caught Monday.

themes.name: low-confidence
themes.notes: Targeted research for specimens with low-confidence classifications.

themes.name: taxonomy-gaps
themes.notes: Discovery searches for underrepresented structural models in the taxonomy grid.

themes.name: tier3-extended-podcasts
themes.notes: Monthly cycle through Tier 3 (8+ shows) and extended network podcasts.

themes.name: industry-discovery
themes.notes: Run industry-specific discovery searches from earnings-calendar.json discoveryProtocol. Rotate: healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, automotive weekly.

themes.name: source-staleness-audit
themes.notes: Read source-registry.json. Find all sources where scannedThroughDate is > 14 days old. Generate priority list for the week ahead. Run targeted research on the most stale sources.

themes.name: catch-up
themes.notes: Process any research backlog: pending files not yet curated, specimens in synthesis queue, stale source-registry entries. Adaptive — picks the most behind phase.

weeklyThroughputTargets.notes: At 40-55 targets/night x 7 nights. First run (Sunday) completed in 33 min. Stale refresh cycles through all 157 specimens in ~7 Thursdays.
